title: iMac 21 2012 and 2014 screen?
message:
I don't think so. 2012 and 2013 already have difference so do the 2014 I guess.
Ebay will tell you... search for a 2012 screen on eBay and see if they report it as compatible for 2014...

title: iMac 21 2012 and 2014 screen?
message: The backlight cable has a slightly different shape but it kind of fits.

title: iMac 21 2012 and 2014 screen?
message: The LCD's have worked for me on both a 2012 and 2014, however, the cables don't bend into the same positions perfectly, so you kinda have to jimmy them if you want to use displays interchangeably.
